question_one.text: What are the topics of the bills passed by the Oregon Legislative Assembly during the 2007 session?

answers.text: Details on the bills passed by the Oregon Legislative Assembly during the 2007 session can be found at http://www.oregonite.org/legs/legs2.php. The given portion of the document only provides the source for finding the information and does not list the topics of the bills.

The topics of the bills passed by the Oregon Legislative Assembly during the 2007 session vary widely, including issues such as expanding the use of photo radar and red light enforcement, various signing requirements, and gates for light rail pedestrian crossings. More details on the bills can be found at http://www.oregonite.org/legs/legs2.php.

Approximately 13 transportation-related bills were passed by the Oregon Legislative Assembly during the 2007 session, covering a wide range of topics such as expanding the use of photo radar and red light enforcement, various signing requirements, and gates for light rail pedestrian crossings  .

question_three.text: What are the benefits of the Oregon Section's online banking and check card system?

answers.text: There is no information provided in the given portion of the document about the benefits of the Oregon Section's online banking and check card system.

The Oregon Section's online banking and check card system allows for faster processing of payments and account inquiries, as well as a significant reduction in the overall number of reimbursement checks. Additionally, the system allows for more routine expenditures to be made using the check card, which may be more convenient for the Section. However, there is no information provided on any other specific benefits of the system.
